title: Laplace Expansion Quiz
description: Test your understanding of cofactor expansion for calculating determinants.

questions.question: What is the cofactor C₁₁ for matrix [1 2; 3 4]?
Laplace expansion can be performed along:
questions.explanation: Expansion can be done along any row or any column.

questions.question: What is the sign pattern for cofactors?
When calculating a 4×4 determinant using Laplace expansion, how many 3×3 determinants do you need to calculate?
questions.explanation: Expanding along one row gives 4 cofactors, each requiring one 3×3 determinant.

questions.question: What should you choose for efficient Laplace expansion?
options: Row or column with most zeros
Row or column with largest elements
questions.explanation: Choose rows/columns with many zeros to minimize calculations.
